HyperSecu

HyperSecu, based in British Columbia, Canada, is a small vendor of U2F tokens founded in 2009. Their primary products are U2F tokens (HyperFIDO) and PKI tokens (HyperPKI). Many of their products are customized versions of FeiTian devices.

HyperFIDO Pro Mini

Small and unassuming, good for a desktop with occasional travel.
More information

HyperFIDO Titanium PRO

No-frills and durable, HyperSECU’s HyperFIDO Titanium Pro provides a basic option for keychains.
More information
